body:
The spec above would be vulnerable to Jexl's `[]` syntax oddities. To work around this, I think we could do something like this:

```jexl
normandy|getAddon('shield-recipe-client@mozilla.org') // truthyness means the add-on is installed
normandy|getAddon('shield-recipe-client@mozilla.org').version == '1.0.0'
```

Fixing the `[]` issue might be a better long term solution though.
